sentence.Network_en: Those who today pretend to be Christ's followers hypocritically profess to carry out those teachings now.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天那些冒牌的基督教徒假惺惺地声称他们现在要实行这些教导.

sentence.Network_en: He behaved hypocritically by praying piously when people were watching.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们看着他的时候,他虚伪地假装自己在虔诚地祈祷.

sentence.Network_en: Love is, encouraging him hypocritically when he is facing some seduction.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱,是听说他有别的诱惑,违心的鼓励他去争取,期间带点酸酸的讽刺.
